sentence: Pete Buttigieg says that prohibiting classroom instruction of sex and gender theory in kindergarten classes will KILL KIDS.? Then he blames Ron DeSantis for inflation and gas prices.
author: Sarah Arnold
title: Gender Transition Closets May Be Coming to a School Near You

author: Ben Werschkul
title: Disney's fight with Florida's governor reflects a 'new paradigm,' Republican lawmaker says

sentence: The release comes as Disney is embroiled in a fierce controversy over its opposition to House Bill 1557, known as the Parental Rights in Education Bill.? The law, signed by Governor Ron DeSantis in March of this year, prohibits classroom discussions on gender identity, sexual orientation, and LGBTQ themes in elementary school until Grade 3, and allows parents to sue school districts for non-compliance.
author: Arjun Singh
title: Disney Unveils New 2022 Pride Clothing Line for LGBTQ Children

author: Amie Parnes
title: Speculation over whether Biden will run again heats up
